title: Languanizr language package
description: Languanizr is a smart multilanguage toolkit for websites.

words.1: A smart client side translation script
words.5: Create multi language sites simple and fast with the client side translation script and the online language editor.
words.9: Translating static, dynamic text, tag attributes and static input values.
words.11: Include languanizr.js, create your language packages, setup your markup. Done!
words.13: Using the latest jquery library and local storage to boost your translation. Only XXX KB JavaScript.
words.15: Create super fast your own language packages with the online language editor.
words.17: Hell yeah! User friendly and fast editor for creating custom language packages in maximum speed! Also speed up your markup setup ;)
words.19: It's Open-Source and you can use it for any private or commercial projects. Licensed under MIT license.
words.21: Support all recent versions of Firefox and Chrome. TODO
